help-file.title: "GREY ELF"
help-file.content:
Unlike their cousins the drow, grey elves live on the surface and prefer to dwell in forests. They are exceptionally intelligent and swift, but are inclined to be weaker and smaller than humans. Grey elves have a good- natured disposition and tend to love animals and nature, although they loathe drow. They are born with infravision, but, unlike drow, can see perfectly in daylight.
Class list: Warrior, Ranger, Cleric, Conjurer, Druid, Sorcerer, Thief, Bard. Statistics: Elves tend to be weaker and frailer than Humans, but are also quicker and more intelligent. Grey elves also have an innate resistance to magic attacks. Innate abilities: infravision, outdoor sneak
